entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:57 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12 except low minus 18 in low lying inland areas. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 12 except low minus 18 in low lying inland areas. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries in onshore winds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16 except minus 21 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 16 except minus 21 inland. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 18.
